attributes.action: Change the law relating to the use of force by homeowners when attacked
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the light of the recent conviction of Mr Munir Hussain & Mr Tookeer Hussain following an incident where a thief was beaten after he and 2 accomplices broke into Mr Munir Hussain’s home and  threatened and beat his family I should like to propose a change in the law. I suggest that MP Patrick Mercers’ 2005 Private Members Bill be re-tabled and subject to a FREE VOTE in the house  to change the law to require criminal nvestigation of the householder only where  “grossly disproportionate force” has been used by the householder in the defence of property as is required by civil law
